short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Create libraries for your custom AI prompts
short.de: Erstellen Sie Bibliotheken für Ihre benutzerdefinierten KI-Prompts
short.es: Cree bibliotecas para sus prompts de IA personalizados
short.fr: Créez des bibliothèques pour vos prompts IA personnalisés
short.hu: Hozzon létre könyvtárakat az egyéni AI-promptjai számára
short.it: Crea biblioteche per i tuoi prompt IA personalizzati
short.pt_BR: Crie uma biblioteca personalizada de prompts de IA
short.pt_PT: Crie uma biblioteca personalizada de instruções de IA
short.ru: Создайте библиотеки для ваших пользовательских подсказок ИИ
short.tr: Özel AI komutlarınız için kütüphaneler oluşturun
short.uk: Створіть бібліотеки для своїх індивідуальних запитів ШІ
short.zh_CN: 为您的自定义AI提示创建库
short.zh_TW: 為您的自定義AI提示創建庫

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create Your Custom AI Prompt Library

Unlock Possibilities with My AI Prompt

To get started, simply install the extension and click on the icon.

📢 Enhance your interactions with AI using customized prompts
📁 Sort and access your prompts easily with customizable tags and folders
🔍 Quickly locate your favorite prompts with search functionality
💡 Bring a creative element to your interactions with AI through prompt variables
📱 Keep your AI prompts consistent across multiple devices with our Google Sheets integration
🌐 Enjoy the flexibility of this extension across various AI agents
↔ Facilitate the import and export of your AI prompts, ensuring versatility and accessibility across platforms
🌎 Interact with AI in your preferred language. My AI Prompt supports 12 languages, enabling barrier-free interactions with AI.
🆓 Unleash the potential of AI without limitations. My AI Prompt is free and open-source, ensuring you complete freedom of use.
